column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A drunk driver smashed into a concrete divider at 10:10 pm on March 5
column5: at the bridge along Russian Federation Road
column9: the  man was drunk driving a silver Highlander back from his birthday party at Diamond Island. Traveling from westbound on Russian Federal Highway at high speed
column10: the driver went straight into the concrete. No injuries were reported.------After the incident
column11: local authorities towing the vehicle to be kept at the traffic police office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police to await further legal action. ------POST NEWS
